name: Apostrophe
tagline: Apostrophe is a content management system designed for maximum flexibility with a minimal learning curve.
body:
### Welcome to Apostrophe

*A user-friendly, contextual CMS powered by node.js*

The following HOWTOs build skills progressively, so you can start with installation and keep reading to master configuration, frontend development and advanced backend development.

## HOWTO

[Install the requirements for Apostrophe on your laptop](http://github.com/punkave/apostrophe-sandbox)
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
